name: Three Domain Disgust Questionnaire (scores)
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: A dataset containing subscale scores for to the Three Domain Disgust Questionnaire (Tybur et al.), calculated from [disgust].

variableMeasured.name: moral
variableMeasured.description: The mean value for the 7 moral items

variableMeasured.name: pathogen
variableMeasured.description: The mean value for the 7 pathogen items

variableMeasured.name: sexual
variableMeasured.description: The mean value for the 7 sexual items
